Verses: 1 karththaraagiya Aandavar Enakkuk Kaanbiththadhaavadhu: Idho, Raajaavinudaiya Pullaruppukkuppinbu Irandaam Kandhaayaththup Pul Mulaikkath Thodangugaiyil Avar Vettukkiligalai Undaakkinaar.
2 avaigal Dhesaththin Pullaiththindru Theerndhapodhu, Naan: Karththaraagiya Aandavare Manniththarulum; Yaakkobu Thirumba Yaaraale Ezhundhiruppaan? Avan Siruththupponaan Endren.
3 karththar Adharku Manasthaabappattu, Appadi Aavadhillai Endraar.

4 karththaraagiya Aandavar Enakkuk Kaanbiththadhaavadhu: Idho, Akkiniyaale Nyaayam Visaarippen Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Erpattaar; Adhu Magaa Aazhiyaip Patchiththadhu, Adhil Oru Pangaip Patchiththuth Theerndhadhu.
5 appozhudhu Naan: Karththaraagiya Aandavare, Niruththume; Yaakkobu Thirumba Yaaraale Ezhundhiruppaan? Avan Siruththupponaan Endren.
6 karththar Adharku Manasthaabappattu, Appadi Aavadhillai Endraar.
7 pinbu Avar Enakkuk Kaanbiththadhaavadhu: Idho, Thookkunool Pramaanaththinaal Kattappatta Oru Madhilinmel Nindraar; Avar Kaiyil Thookkunool Irundhadhu.

8 karththar Ennai Nokki: Aamose, Nee Ennaththaik Kaangiraai Endraar; Thookkunoolaik Kaangiren Endren; Appozhudhu Aandavar: Idho, Isravelennum Enjanaththin Naduve Thookkunoolai Viduven; Ini Avargalai Mannikkamaatten.
9 eesaakkin Medaigal Paazhum, Isravelin Parisuththa Sthalangal Avaandharamumaakkappadum; Naan Erobeyaam Veettaarukku Virodhamaaip Pattayaththode Ezhumbivaruven Endraar.

10 appozhudhu Beththelil Aasaariyanaana Amadhsiyaa Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Erobeyaamukku Aal Anuppi: Aamos Isravel Vamsaththaarin Naduve Umakku Virodhamaagak Kattuppaadu Pannugiraan; Dhesam Avan Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Sagikkamaattaadhu.
11 erobeyaam Pattayaththinaal Saavaan Endrum, Isravel Thandhesaththilirundhu Siraipidiththukkondupogappaduvaan Endrum Aamos Sollugiraan Endru Sollachchonnaan.
12 amadhsiyaa Aamosai Nokki: Dharisanam Paarkkiravane, Po; Nee Yoodhaadhesaththukku Odippo, Ange Appam Thindru, Ange Theerkkadharisanam Sollu.
13 beththelile Inith Theerkkadharisanam Sollaadhe; Adhu Raajaavin Parisuththa Sthalamum Raajyaththin Aramanaiyumaayirukkiradhu Endraan.
14 aamos Amadhsiyaavukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Naan Theerkkadharisiyumalla, Theerkkadharisiyin Puththiranumalla; Naan Mandhai Meykkiravanum, Kaattaththippazhangalaip Porukkugiravanumaayirundhen.
15 aanaal Mandhaiyin Pinnaale Pogirapodhu Ennaik Karththar Azhaiththu, Nee Poi En Janamaagiya Isravelukku Virodhamaagath Theerkkadharisanam Sollu Endru Karththar Uraiththaar.
16 ippodhum Nee Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kel; Isravelukku Virodhamaaith Theerkkadharisanam Sollaadhe, Eesaakkin Vamsaththaarukku Virodhamaaga Ondraiyum Sollaadhe Endru Sollugiraaye.

17 idhinimiththam: Un Penjaadhi Nagaraththil Vesiyaavaal; Un Kumaararum Un Kumaaraththigalum Pattayaththaal Vizhuvaargal; Un Vayal Alavu Noolaal Pangittukkollappadum; Neeyaavenil Asuththamaana Dhesaththile Seththuppovaai; Isravelum Than Dhesaththilirundhu Siraipidikkappattuk Kondupogappaduvaan Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endraan.
